MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the West Raglan Project in North America dated March 2003

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the West Raglan Project in North America dated March 2003
document.description: This report summarizes field work carried out by NovaWest Resources in 1998 on the Raglan Project, including prospecting on 6 permit areas in Ungava, with a comprehensive program proposal for further exploration.

deposit_type_candidate.observed_name: stratiform at base of Komatiitic unit (Katinniq a Model)
footwall vein stringers in host associated with type Ia (Katinniq b Model)
blebby internal coarse disseminated in komatiite units
cloudy fine disseminations in komatiites (Katinniq c Model)
reef stratiform at or near contact between lower cumulate zone and upper gabbro unit in strongly differentiated units (Delta Model)
metasediment layers in meta-sediments associated with type I mineralization (Thompson 'a' model)
vein in wall rocks associated with type I mineralization (Donaldson Model)
offset in faults and shears within host and wall rocks associated with type I mineralization (Thompson 'b' Model)
